text: Badtameez Gill is an unreleased Hindi-language comedy drama movie directed by Navjot Gulati. Made by Nicky Vicky Bhagnani Films, it stars Vaani Kapoor, Aparshakti Khurana, Paresh Rawal, Sheeba Chaddha and Monica Chaudhary. The movie was scheduled for a theater release on 29 November 2024. == Cast == The movie stars * Vaani Kapoor * Aparshakti Khurana * Paresh Rawal * Sheeba Chaddha * Monica Chaudhary == Production == The movie was announced in May 2024. Principal photography commenced the same month. The movie was mainly shot in Bareilly and London before wrapping in July 2024. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Badtameez Gill
